description: A web application that generates glassmorphism CSS styles for backgrounds, allowing users to copy the CSS code for use in their own projects.

title: Event Countdown Timer
description: A modern and animated event countdown timer that lets users set an event name, date, and time. Features include real-time countdown updates, pause/resume control, reset functionality, visual warnings when time is low, and smooth number animations.

title: Silent Animation Guessing Game 🎞️
description: A visual guessing game where users interpret silent animations and identify the situation.

title: Digital Burnout Awareness
description: An awareness page that explains digital burnout, its symptoms, causes, and simple prevention tips.

title: Weekly Productivity Reflection
description: A calm reflection page that helps users review their weekly productivity and identify improvements.

title: Productivity Myths: Myth vs Fact
description: A Myth vs Fact guide that debunks common productivity myths followed by students.

title: StudyRest Balance Guide
description: A visual guide that explains the importance of balancing study time with proper rest and recovery.

title: Distractions Tracker
description: A simple tracker that helps users identify common distractions and improve focus during study sessions.

title: LearnXO
description: LearnXO is an interactive educational web project designed to help users learn concepts through structured lessons, quizzes, and simple visual explanations using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Interactive History Timeline
description: An interactive timeline to explore historical eras with facts and mini quizzes.

title: Virtual Museum of Common Mistakes
description: An interactive museum showcasing common mistakes and how to avoid them.

title: Retro Pixel Habit Tracker
description: A gamified habit tracker that grows a pixel character as habits are completed.

title: Interactive Learning
description: An interactive simulator that demonstrates the consequences of various decisions in real-life scenarios, helping users understand cause and effect relationships.

title: Swarmpath
description: Swarmpath is an interactive web-based visualization inspired by swarm intelligence and path exploration. It showcases how simple agents collectively discover efficient paths through dynamic environments using real-time visual feedback.

title: Timeline Ordering Game
description: A drag-and-drop game where users arrange events into the correct order.

title: Guess Your Friend
description: A fun game where users predict how their friend would answer questions.

title: Continuous Line Drawing Challenge
description: A drawing challenge where users must draw without lifting the mouse.

title: Color Sorting Puzzle
description: A colorful logic puzzle where users sort layered colors into correct jars.

title: Spot the Mistake
description: A visual challenge where users find logical or UI mistakes between similar layouts.

title: Emoji Emotion Guess Game
description: A visual game where users guess emotions or situations from emoji combinations.

title: Silent Animation Guessing Game
description: A visual guessing game where users interpret silent animations and identify the situation.

title: CommandDock
description: CommandDock is a command-driven web interface that allows users to control and manipulate UI components using typed commands. It explores keyboard-first interaction patterns and dynamic UI behavior through real-time visual feedback.

title: Movie Drawing Guess Game
description: A Pictionary-style game where players draw a movie and others guess it.

title: Smart Adaptive Quiz
description: A full-screen interactive quiz application with dynamic difficulty adjustment. Questions adapt in real time based on user performance across multiple topics and difficulty levels, providing an engaging and personalized learning experience.

title: Event Reminder
description: A smart utility that helps users create, manage, and track upcoming events in one place. It highlights todays, upcoming, and overdue events while using LocalStorage to ensure reminders persist across sessions.

title: Interactive Learning
description: An interactive simulator that demonstrates the consequences of various decisions in real-life scenarios, helping users understand cause and effect relationships.

title: Swarmpath
description: Swarmpath is an interactive web-based visualization inspired by swarm intelligence and path exploration. It showcases how simple agents collectively discover efficient paths through dynamic environments using real-time visual feedback.

title: Silent Animation Guessing Game
description: A visual guessing game where users interpret silent animations and identify the situation.

title: CommandDock
description: CommandDock is a command-driven web interface that allows users to control and manipulate UI components using typed commands. It explores keyboard-first interaction patterns and dynamic UI behavior through real-time visual feedback.

title: Daily Planner
description: A simple and user-friendly daily planner that allows users to create, manage, and track tasks for a single day. It supports marking tasks as completed or pending and provides a one-click daily reset for a fresh start, helping users practice basic CRUD operations and frontend state management.

title: Movie Drawing Guess Game
description: A Pictionary-style game where players draw a movie and others guess it.

title: Retro Snake Game
description: A classic retro-style Snake game built using HTML Canvas with pixel-inspired visuals, keyboard controls, increasing difficulty, and a scoring system for an engaging learning experience.

title: Authentication Flow Visualizer
description: An interactive educational tool to visualize complex authentication flows (Session, JWT, OAuth) and security attacks (Replay, Expiry, Tampering). Built with vanilla HTML, CSS, and JS.

title: RageClicker
description: RageClicker is a fast-paced clicking game that challenges users to test their reaction speed and endurance. It offers instant visual feedback and engaging interactions using pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
